scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Alison
scrape.text: Being a parent myself, I was both horrified and fascinated by this, the depiction of how far we might go to protect our children. I’ve stepped in too many times to bail my son out of trouble and have had to learn to step back and let him take responsibility for his actions but I did find myself thinking - how would I react in this situation? I’d like to hope that I’d take a stronger moral standing than the unpleasant characters in this book - which also demonstrates that both nature and nurture have a lot to answer for. Not a fun read, but definitely thought provoking.
